724377f-a.text:
West Broadway, west side, north from but not including Thomas,
to and including Worth Streets.
October 10, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
724377f-a.folder: West Broadway & Thomas Street, Manhattan, NY

724376f-a.text:
West Broadway, at the N.E. corner of Thomas Street, as seen through the excavation on the N.W. corner of West Broadway and Thomas Street for
the Western Union Telegraph Building.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
